TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContractReferenceAssemblyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ContractReferenceAssemblyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ContractReferenceAssemblyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定組件為包含合約的參考組件。

span.span: Specifies that an assembly is a reference assembly that contains contracts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 合約的參考組件名為*組件*。Contracts.dll，其中*組件*是所擷取的合約組件的名稱。A contract reference assembly is named *assembly*.Contracts.dll, where *assembly* is the name of the assembly from which the contracts were extracted. 合約的參考組件包含公開可見的介面的組件和其合約，但不包含程式碼。A contract reference assembly contains the publicly visible interface of an assembly and its contracts, but contains no code. 合約參考組件都能使用繼承的合約組件，以及靜態驗證期間執行階段分析器來探索方法和分析的組件之外的組件的類型上的合約。Contract reference assemblies are used both by the runtime analyzer to inherit contracts across assemblies, and during static verification to discover contracts on methods and types from assemblies outside the assembly that is under analysis. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
